item.title: US wants 'special economic zone' in Ukraine's frontline region, Zelensky says
item.description: Ukraine's president says territory and control of the Zaporizhzhia nuclear power remain unresolved issues in a peace plan.

item.title: Thousands ready to evacuate as flooding hits Pacific Northwest
item.description: An atmospheric river has caused torrential rain and flooding in parts of Canada and the United States.

item.title: Cameras on killer whales record first evidence of joint hunt with dolphins
item.description: Researchers say the footage, captured near the North-West Pacific coast, is the first recorded evidence of the two working together.

item.title: US judge orders Kilmar Abrego Garcia's release from ICE custody
item.description: The judge rules detaining Abrego Garcia was "without lawful authority", and he will now at least temporarily be allowed to return to his Maryland home...

item.title: Ethiopia arrests 'indecently' dressed social media stars after awards ceremony
item.description: Adonay Berhane, Wongelawit Gebre Endrias and four others are accused by police of undermining public morality.
